#summary ThreadSanitizer build bot

We have a continuous build of ThreadSanitizer at http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/tsan/waterfall

You may download the latest ThreadSanitizer binaries at
http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/tsan/binaries.
For example, for x86_64 Linux you will need the binary `http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/tsan/binaries/tsan-r1908-amd64-linux-self-contained.sh`.

To get it do:
{{{
wget http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/tsan/binaries/tsan-r1908-amd64-linux-self-contained.sh
chmod +x tsan-r1908-amd64-linux-self-contained.sh
}}}

When downloading a fresh binary make sure that the build bot is green.
